text: Pingdingshan (平顶山) is a prefecture-level city in central Henan province, China. It is also called Eagle City. In 2010, 4,904,701 people lived there. ==Administration== Pingdingshan administers 4 districts, 2 county-level cities and 4 counties. *Xinhua District () *Weidong District () *Zhanhe District () *Shilong District () *Ruzhou City () *Wugang City () *Lushan County () *Baofeng County () *Ye County () *Jia County () Category:Cities in China Category:Henan
title: Pingdingshan
